<<<<<<< HEAD
Theatrum Scotiæ containing the prospects of Their Majesties castles and palaces : together with those of the most considerable towns and colleges, the ruins of many ancient abbeys, churches, monasteries and convents, within the said kingdom : all curiously engraven on copper plates, with a short description of each place / by John Slezer ... Slezer, John, d. 1714. Sibbald, Robert, Sir, 1641-1722. Trenchard, John, Sir, 1640-1695.
[10], 65, [2] p., [114] p. of plates : ill.
Printed by John Leake for Abell Swalle ..., London : 1693.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Proclamation at beginning of work signed: J. Trenchard. The descriptions drawn up by Sir R. Sibbald were intended to be published in Latin, but were inaccurately translated into English without leave or acknowledgement of the author. Table of contents: p. [9] Errata: p. 65. Engraved on double plates.
=======
Theatrum Scotiæ containing the prospects of Their Majesties castles and palaces : together with those of the most considerable towns and colleges, the ruins of many ancient abbeys, churches, monasteries and convents, within the said kingdom : all curiously engraven on copper plates, with a short description of each place / by John Slezer ... Slezer, John, d. 1714. Sibbald, Robert, Sir, 1641-1722. Trenchard, John, Sir, 1640-1695.
[10], 65, [2] p., [114] p. of plates : ill.
Printed by John Leake for Abell Swalle ..., London : 1693.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Proclamation at beginning of work signed: J. Trenchard. The descriptions drawn up by Sir R. Sibbald were intended to be published in Latin, but were inaccurately translated into English without leave or acknowledgement of the author. Table of contents: p. [9] Errata: p. 65. Engraved on double plates.
Abell Swalle
John Leake
